div.p: May is coming and it is high time for a good American Barbecue. Chef Corp. ups the ante by opening the event for professional cooks.

May is coming and it is high time for a good American Barbecue. Chef Corp. ups the ante by opening the event for professional cooks who will be in contention for a free year of our Extended Service and Maintenance Plan. Join us on the first weekend of May at the Waveland Park in Chicago, Illinois and rate the ribs!
